patthana16.62:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva
patthana16.62:1.1_2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva
patthana16.62:1.1_4: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva
patthana16.62:1.1_5: naāsavavippayutto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.62:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavavippayutto
patthana16.62:2.1_1: ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
